Text:
So many downloaders !  lol

The guy is totally insane but can be amusing, I guess ;-)

bobert-bobert, there you mentioned one of my main  reasons for more or less supporting Icke (though I'm in no way fanatical about it, he's just one of the sources I draw - and screen - information from).

You are absolutely stating an important fact there (We are being manipulated by those in power), just thought i'd point it out.
just curious, how many of his books have you read?
"The individual is handicapped by coming face to face with a conspiracy so monstrous he cannot belive it exists." ~~ J. Edgar Hoover
